name: Dimitiros Ioannou
story: Dimitrios grew up in a small village in southern Greece. He always had an interest in technology and joined the military at a young age to become a UAV operator. His calm and collected personality makes him well-suited for the job, able to survey even the most chaotic of situations. He is dedicated to his work and always ensures that his equipment is in top condition. In his free time, he enjoys tinkering with electronics and watching football matches.
